title: She-Ra Princess of Power Cartoon for The Honor of Grayskull JRS Sheer T-Shirt
features: WASH & WEAR - No high maintenance care instructions here. Just toss this little beauty in the washer on cold and tumble or hang dry.

YOUR NEW FAVORITE GRAPHIC TEE: Our supersoft cotton t-shirt is the all-season preshrunk cotton tee you've been waiting for. Showcasing a relaxed silhouette that pairs easily with jeans or a cardy, this classic crew will become a fashion-forward favorite.

CASUAL COMFORT: Our everyday tee features short-cap sleeves, a ribbed crew neckline, relaxed fit, and versatile straight hemline to complement everything in your closet from those oh-so-comfy jeans, to that skirt your mother gave you.

PREMIUM QUALITY: Designed to last, our premium top is crafted from 100% preshrunk ringspun cotton for comfort and breathable durability. For best results, wear weekly, machine was cold, and tumble dry low.

OFFICIALLY LICENSED: Each of our designs are guaranteed authentic and 100% officially licensed. This exclusive creation was brought to life by our talented in-house team of graphic artists who often hand draw and illustrate each T-shirt design.
GREAT FOR GIFTING: OurÂ graphic tees are perfect for birthday presents, Christmas & holiday gifts, swag/goodie bags, or just treating yourself!
description: The design depicted is only printed on the front of the t-shirt. There is no design on the back of the t-shirt. This t-shirt is hand-made and unique, using high quality 100% cotton. This graphic print design is printed only on the front of the shirt. Image is for clarity. Due to different computer monitors/calibrations, colors may vary from the picture.
